p: This study was funded by the Ministry of higher education, University Hassan II of Casablanca, Faculty of Sciences and Techniques, Mohammedia, and also Royal Gendarmery of Morocco. The authors thank all the research staff at the Laboratory of Virology, Microbiology, Quality and Biotechnologies/Ecotoxicology & Biodiversity, and Genetics Laboratory of Royal Gendarmeries for their support and technical help.
